alertitem.name: Insecure HTTP Method - PUT
alertitem.desc: This method was originally intended for file managemant operations. It is now most commonly used in REST services, PUT is most-often utilized for **update** capabilities, PUT-ing to a known resource URI with the request body containing the newly-updated representation of the original resource..
